bug.author: momohatt
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/classification>https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/keras/classification</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
When you open the above tutorial, the description of the dataset (Fashion MNIST) is placed at the bottom of the page. However, in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/docs/blob/master/site/en/tutorials/keras/classification.ipynb>the original .ipynb file</denchmark-link> , it is in the first section "Import the Fashion MNIST dataset". It seems that the order of the paragraph is wrongly rearranged when building the web page.

comments.comment: Thanks for reporting. I'll fix it.
